about_the_game:
We wanted to show you guys the progress of the game we are working on. We currently have two levels available and are looking for feedback. I think we need to add more sounds to the soundscape for sure and perhaps finetune enemies and combat. But there is plenty of room for other additions and ideas as well. What would you like to see? Let us know and perhaps it will make it into the game!

Enjoy!
